Public health officials are urging Americans concerned about #vaping to reach out to poison control centers at 1-800-222-1222. 

Poison control centers, like the #NewYorkCity Regional Poison Control Center, are critical to public safety. 

We need to maintain their funding.

Really alarming numbers here. 

Poison Control Centers are the on the front-line of this growing #vaping epidemic. 

I’m leading the way to reauthorize their federal funding with my Poison Center Network Enhancement Act, which passed the House. #HR501 https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1170022391709392896 …

Trump Admin is giving NY $37M to tackle the opioid crisis, a drop in the bucket compared to the billions they seek for things like POTUS' ridiculous border wall. I’m cosponsoring the Comprehensive Addiction Resources Emergency Act which would provide $100B to combat the epidemic.

Sadly, these storms are getting bigger & occurring more frequently. It's past time to address the effect of #ClimateChange.
